original: intros. intros lim_f lim_u lim_seq_u. apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u) (l := x) in lim_seq_u. apply is_lim_seq in lim_f. apply is_lim_seq_subseq with (u := (fun n : nat => f (u n))) (phi := id) in lim_f. apply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := (fun n : nat => f (u n))) in lim_seq_u. apply lim_seq_u. apply lim_f. intros. unfold id. reflexivity.
